alert.note: Alert for Haskell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:51AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Haskell County through 145 AM CDT... At 1250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jud, or 9 miles north of Old Glory, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Stamford, Rule, Rochester, Weinert, O`brien, Irby, Paint Creek, Sagerton, Lake Stamford Marina, Us-277 Near The Haskell- Knox County Line, Jud and Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
